summary: Water quality parameters are stable and within optimal ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and the selected plants.

insights.recommendation: Maintain current pH levels; optimal range for tilapia is 6.5-8.5.
Continue monitoring; TDS levels are suitable for both fish and plants.
Maintain temperature; ideal range for tilapia is 24-30°C.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.033 / 7.005 / 7.106 (trend: flat)
• TDS avg/min/max: 333.893 / 307.8 / 342.7 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 24.142 / 20.94 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
